steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Select the text or paragraph that you want to change the background color for.
Go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Shading' button in the 'Paragraph' group.
A drop-down menu will appear. Select the desired background color from the available options.
The selected text or paragraph will now have the new background color applied to it.
